sentence.Network_en: America is the most intellectually, artistically and politically effervescent of nations.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国是学术、艺术和政治氛围最活跃的国家。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Gibson is clearly intellectually out of his depth.
sentence.Network_cn: 吉布森先生显然才智不逮。

sentence.Network_en: He preferred the company of those who were intellectually inferior to himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喜欢与那些智力水平不如他的人共处。

PerfectNetExp.abs: intellectualized 智能化的intellectually 知性上intelligence ageney 情报局
12年6月-09年12月六级真题题词表 - 豆丁网 ... drawback 缺点，不利条件 intellectually 智力上;理智地 option 选择权；买卖的特权.
aware intuitively or intellectually of something sensed., 在知觉或者理智上明白了被感觉的事物.
He is beneath his brother intellectually ., 他在智力方面不如他兄弟.

list.abs: 知字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 知识〖 knowledge〗 知识分子〖 intellectual〗 知识青年〖 edeucatedyouth〗.
... . . .于不同的符号形态(symbolic forms)编译出不同的信息，而不同的媒介具有不同的符号形态,所以它门便具有不同的理性或知识（intellectual）和感性（emotional）偏倚。.

entry.def: Intellectual means involving a person's ability to think and to understand ideas and information.

example.ex: High levels of lead could damage the intellectual development of children...
example.tran: 铅含量过高会损害儿童的智力发展。

example.ex: He has written seven thrillers, and clearly enjoys intellectual pursuits.
example.tran: 他已经写了7本惊悚小说,显然很喜欢这样的智力活动。

entry.def: An intellectual is someone who spends a lot of time studying and thinking about complicated ideas.

example.tran: 教师、艺术家和其他知识分子

auth_sentence.content: This is more than a little awkward, intellectually.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is more than a little awkward, intellectually.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is more than a little awkward, intellectually.

auth_sentence.content: Is it because the readers are more intellectually inclined?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is it because the readers are more intellectually inclined?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is it because the readers are more intellectually inclined?

auth_sentence.content: I don't think that he's weak intellectually.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't think that he's weak intellectually.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't think that he's weak intellectually.

Sentence.sentence: For one, it deprives students of the luxury of time to roam (遨游) intellectually.
Students don't have much time to roam intellectually
In Einstein's day, there were only a few thousand physicists worldwide, and the theoreticians who could intellectually rival Einstein probably would fit into a streetcar with seats to spare.
